name: Mystic Touch - Demo
description:
Mystic Touch is a retro turn-based RPG inspired by classics of the SNES era.

The story follows Elise, a young woman who awakens to the power of the Mystic and goes on a journey to discover more about this power while having to battle the Reapers, a group that uses the Mystic for their evil goals.

My first game, made (mostly) all by myself with a little pixel art skills.
Music by: ASCII/Enterbrain (from RPG Maker XP)

This is a playable demo that contains the beginning of the game.

Feedback is always welcome!

(This game is still in development, everything is subject to change in the final version.)
